# WKContextMenuElementInfo

**Class**

An object that contains information about a link the user clicked in a webpage, and which you use to configure a context menu for that link.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class WKContextMenuElementInfo
```

## Overview

A [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKContextMenuElementInfo] object contains the URL of a link in the web view’s content. You don’t create instances of this class directly. Instead, the web view creates them and passes them to the methods of its associated [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKUIDelegate] object when the user interacts with the link. In your delegate method implementations, use the URL in this object to determine how to configure the contextual menu.

## Getting the Element Information

- **linkURL**: The URL of the link that the user clicked.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
